Sticky Footer.

The Sticky footer will use the <footer> tag and make it "stick" to the bottom of the page.

You may pre-style the <footer> in your css file. The stiky footer will remember your original styles if the page is not long enough to "stick" to the bottom of the page! Even after resize!

There are no requirements for CSS! You don't even need a fixed height, or a wrapper!

It even works in mobile! Go on, check it out!

Download The Files!

Right Side.

This is a Sticky Footer.
It will stick to the bottom of the page onload().
It will also re-stick after a window resize.
